meta.description: Determine the number of golf carts and pull carts needed to transport guests while minimizing the total number of carts.

sets.name: CART_TYPES
sets.description: Types of carts available for transporting guests.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of cart in terms of number of guests.

params.name: max_golf_cart_ratio
params.description: Maximum allowed ratio of golf carts to total carts.

params.name: min_guests
params.description: Minimum number of guests that need to be transported.

vars.name: num_carts
vars.description: Number of each type of cart to be used.

objective.name: min_total_carts
objective.description: Minimize the total number of carts used.

constraints.name: guest_transportation_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of guests are transported.

constraints.name: golf_cart_ratio_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of golf carts to at most 60% of the total carts.
